main event: The USS Esso Lima reported sighting a UFO in the Gulf of Mexico on 3 December 1962.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright vapor that disappeared after a brief observation,The object was initially reported moving rapidly and had characteristics similar to a rocket,Vibration was observed from the object as it vaporized from above,The sighting occurred at coordinates 25-49N 85-4W,The object was seen 15 degrees above the horizon and vanished bearing 335 degrees.
sighted object: UFO described as a bright vapor or possible rocket
